I asked for a blanket as I saw them being handed out to all the women and was told there were none left, yet 2 minutes later I saw another women being handed a blanket. I asked if we could be moved to near a heater IF one became available and the server angrily said ‚Äòwe have none available‚Äô gesturing to the whole dining area. No one asked us how our starters or mains were, and I had to ask to have our mains cleared (after they were sat for over half an hour) AND to order dessert. Honestly I was so disappointed with the service, however the only saving grace was the food and beverage!The food was lovely, the prawns and the Halibut were cooked to perfection and the balance of flavours were amazing. The cocktails were great too and the bar staff were so friendly and help when choosing a cocktail based on your flavour preference.The views and the decor are incredible and well worth a visit to the top.If the service up their game, this would be an absolutely incredible restaurant!
